overview: She took my hand in Tokyo.  She said I know a place where we could go.  Come on let’s get lost in the city lights.  cause everything’s ok when you’re by my side.  And we’ll laugh out loud cause we don’t know.  Any words they say on the radio.  Baby take my phone I’m not coming home.  Let’s take too many pictures.  She took my hand in Tokyo.
title: Faul & Wad feat. Vertue: Tokyo
